page.title: 17FOREST OF DEAN RIDING CLUB
page.content: TRACY IS 16 AND IS ONE OF THE 70 MEMBERS OF THE FOREST OF DEAN PONY CLUB. SHE PAID Â£8. TO JOIN. THERE IS ALSO A RIDING CLUB FOR ADULTS. SHE HAS TWO HORSES - A 16 YEAR OLD PART THOROUGHBRED CALLED HONEY, 15.2 HANDS: AND A NEW FOREST PONY CALLED GINNY. THE HORSES ARE KEPT ON 2 ACRES AND FED BRAN, PONY-NUTS, HAY AND BEETPULP. THE PONY CLUB MEETS REGULARLY FOR INSTRUCTIONAL RALLIES, AND ABOUT 3 TIMES A YEAR FOR SHOWS, AT THE SPEECH HOUSE FIELD. THE MAIN EVENTS ARE SHOW JUMPING, DRESSAGE, FANCY DRESS, GYMKHANAS, SHOWING AND WORKING HUNTER. TRACY HAS 110 ROSETTES, OF WHICH 7 ARE FIRSTS. A PONY CAN COST Â£350. AND A HORSE Â£900.
